title: Dota player looking for help :)
body:
This is my first season in lol i was profesional dota player and i now want to tryhard this game , so im looking for someone who can play bot with me and give me some advice and booost me up.
i have myb 100 games on some suports and im already gold divison 
just srsly carry call me to go up together :)

replies.body: I find it hard to believe anyone with spelling this awful was a professional anything.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=RUAOAinh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-05T20:51:04.398+0000)
>
> I find it hard to believe anyone with spelling this awful was a professional anything.

Damn lol, agreed.

idk why you commend this post like this ... is your life now better?
i can show screenshots price or awards...
Why league? dota has x3 the money pools, and if you are good at it keep playing? but if you are serious about getting better I'd be down!
